entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
